title.narrative: Civil Society Education Fund Bridging Fund

description.narrative: The Global Campaign for Education (GCE) is a global civil society coalition which works to achieve education for all. In 2009 GCE launched the Civil Society Education Fund to assist national civil society organisations to actively participate in the achievement of quality education. CSEF supports national education coalitions in 45 low income countries across Asia, the Pacific, Africa and Latin America. Activities supported by CSEF include: policy making forums; development and appraisal of education sector plans; and participation in sector reviews of education plan implementation. Under CSEF these coalitions have built national ownership of education plans, and helped to advance transparency and accountability of governments in delivering education programs. The total value of this initiative is $5.0 million over two years, starting 2011-12.
